column2: Allow Git 'Compare with branch' popup to filter based on the branch name

column3:
When selecting compare with branch, a list of branches pops up, this list is not searchable/filterable.
This commit allows the list to be searched just by typing.
Ah awesome thanks! I did try having a look for an existing issue, guess I did look hard enough.
Enabled Git 'Compare with branch' popup to allow filtering/searching бн
